name: Hyper Help!
description:
Accidents happen, it's your task to help patients and rescue them with your ambulance!

Grab your tools and save people with your ambulance! Drive to accidents, treat people with different tools and save their life! Cool mini-games and puzzles will help you solve each task in this ambulance simulator!
Scan for fever, treat them with a bandage, measure their blood pressure and make them feel great again!

You will find:
- Different patients and their pets!
- Cool and fun mini-games!
- Unlock new tools to improve your emergency ambulance!
